div.div: Effect of photostimulation on laying dates in free living great tits.
div.p: One third of the females encountered during a night check of all nest boxes were not taken indoors, 1/3 were taken into captivity and kept under natural light regime and 1/3 were taken into captivity and kept under a long light regime (according to figure 3). Note that random jitter is applied (on the X-axis only) to separate overlapping data point.
